results.title: A Randomized Phase II Study of Irinotecan Plus Cisplatin with or without Simvastatin in Ever-Smokers with Extended Disease Small Cell Lung Cancer
results.text_hl: This study evaluated whether an addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to chemotherapy improves survival in ever-smokers with @<m>DISEASE_Extranodal_Extension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000079822 @@@extensive disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Extranodal_Extension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000079822 @@@ED@@@)-@DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@small cell lung cancer@@@ (@DISEASE_Small_Cell_Lung_Carcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D055752 @@@SCLC@@@).
